title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.4 - Liability of partners
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.4 - Liability of partners

State Regulations

In the case of a partnership which, by ownership or
lease, controls the racing qualities of a horse, all of the partners and each
of them shall be jointly and severally liable for all stakes and
obligations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4220.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
